title: Old Love
lyrics: tone Vòng hợp âm:  - When you were here Nothing can outshined We should be dancing Let's spend the night together Till reach the morning Up and above I wanna hold your hand When you're smiling Whe should keep dancing To treasure this feeling Like it's the old love This is the way that we Under the moonlight Cause this is the moment That you made me feel Like it's the old love Come on and hold me Stay close to me I'll never let go cause I'm just right here When I'm with you I realized that dreams We keep on talking Let's just keep drinking Till moon disappear You're the one The one that'll stay by my side The love of my life Just for the moment We last long forever
